parameters.prompt: electronic, dream-pop, nostalgic, synthesizer, soft-beats, layered-vocals
parameters.lyrics: [verse] The static hums like a lullaby, fading photos in my mind, rewinding time just to see your face one more night [chorus] Glitch in the system, heart skipping frames, memories flicker but they never stay the same [verse] Old VHS glow on the bedroom wall, pixelated whispers of a love I can’t recall [chorus] Glitch in the system, heart skipping frames, memories flicker but they never stay the same [bridge] Press eject, but the tape’s stuck tight, this old machine won’t let go of the light [outro] Snowfall screen, silent and blue, the only thing left is the ghost of you
